wifi_wps.lang_wps_info_title:
Wi-Fi Protected Setup cannot be used with
WPA2 Enterprise security mode
Broadcast SSID disabled
2.4 GHz or 5 GHz band disabled
MAC Filtering
To use WPS, change your security mode, network mode and/or disable MAC Filtering.
wifi_wps.lang_push_button_info_title: If your client device has a Wi-Fi Protected Setup<sup>TM</sup> button, click or press that button and then click the button on the right.
wifi_wps.lang_dev_pin_info_title: If your client device has a Wi-Fi Protected Setup<sup>TM</sup> PIN number, enter that number and then click the register.
wifi_wps.lang_router_pin_info_title: If your client asks for the Router's PIN number, enter this number {number} in your client device
wifi_wps.lang_macfilter_enable_alert_title: Wi-Fi Protected Setup cannot be enabled when Wireless MAC Filter is enabled.
wifi_wps.lang_wps_info_title2:
Wi-Fi Protected Setup cannot be used with
Broadcast SSID disabled
2.4 GHz or 5 GHz band disabled
MAC Filtering
To use WPS, change your security mode, network mode and/or disable MAC Filtering.
